She soars on wings of Serra's light, her sword of faith meting out justice to the wicked.

The most frightening storms are those not woven by nature's hand.

trans-unit.resname: P30A·4 | Wall of Roots | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Defender Put a -0/-1 counter on Wall of Roots: Add {G}. Activate only once each turn.

trans-unit.resname: P30A·4 | Wall of Roots | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Sometimes the wise ones wove their magic into living plants; as the plant grew, so grew the magic.
When Wood Elves enters the battlefield, search your library for a Forest card, put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
Every branch a crossroads, every vine a swift steed.
Each player discards their hand, then draws cards equal to the greatest number of cards a player discarded this way.
"To fill your mind with knowledge, we must start by emptying it."\n—Barrin, master wizard

trans-unit.source: Tarmogoyf's power is equal to the number of card types among cards in all graveyards and its toughness is equal to that number plus 1.
What doesn't grow, dies. And what dies grows the tarmogoyf.

Other Goblin creatures you control attack each combat if able. At the beginning of combat on your turn, create a 1/1 red Goblin creature token with haste. Whenever Goblin Rabblemaster attacks, it gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each other attacking Goblin.

trans-unit.resname: P30A·25 | Path of Ancestry | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Path of Ancestry enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity. When that mana is spent to cast a creature spell that shares a creature type with your commander, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
Whenever you cast a creature spell, draw a card.
"No symphony can compare to the melody of the ferrox's roar."
This spell can't be countered. Counter target noncreature spell.
"It must be infuriating, to pour so much rage into your assault and see it wasted. Perhaps you'll learn something from this."

trans-unit.source: "Through the blood of the wicked, we shall be redeemed. Let us pray."
